item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 12/2013
item.description: Including: Alan Jackson, Auld Lang Syne, Bill Monroe, Christmas Time'S A Coming, Old Bear Mountain, Poor Man'S Whiskey, Ragdoll, Red Rocking Chair, Sons Of Fathers, Special Consensus.
